Bomb will explode in 3... 2... 1...

Hey, everyone, and I wish you welcome to my small demo application about my favorite passion (besides body building, of course), and that is dancing! This small app is doing the following thing: it shows every dance happening in town of Bijeljina displayed on the map. Once you load the app, it will display all dance clubs, schools, parties and festivals happening in Bijeljina. You can filter out anything you don't like, and if you click on any pin on the map, it will allow you to display event details and see the exact address, dance types and every little detail you would like to know.

Of course, data is made up, and it's just a small sample of my coding skills in javascript. Cheers!
